content: Have you ever done anything in which you say that was totally dumb, how'd it happen?!? Let me share a dumb moment. I'm among freinds & I know this won't go any further so here goes... A while back I was laying in bed & dosed off. I woke up feeling super groggy & disorientated. My arm had fallen asleep(hardly ever happens, but it's a creepy feeling). While still in between being asleep & awake I realised I couldn't move my arm. I rolled over onto my back(was sleeping on my right side) & with my left hand reached over & picked up my right arm. I let it go & the dead weight of my arm landed square on my face! I was wearing my glasses & this sent my glasses askew. I yelled out(not comprehending what had happened)!! I was still feeling super groggy & repeated the same action(I guess I wanted to see if it would happen again). Again the arm came down smacking me in the face. This time I snapped to realising what was happening. Basicly I woke up to the fact that I was beating the crap out of myself!! The worse part was my wife was watching TV next to me. She stopped watching the TV & just watched me(I guess I was much more entertaining). For the next week or two she would ocassionaly do a repeat performance of my stupidity & die laughing. I couldn't get mad at her, cause I would do the same. OK, what silly things have you folks done??? Remember, its OK, your amongst freinds!

title: Stupid Moments In One's Life

content: I have a pretty good one about my arm falling asleep.... Fell asleep with it bent behind my head. Well when I woke up, I reached for the hand thinking it was my husbands... well of course I screamed because I felt something grab my hand (the one that was asleep)... yeah, that wasn't one of my better moments.

title: Stupid Moments In One's Life

content: I got one, back when I was single, sleeping alone!!!!!! Had a water bed, tried to pull the sheet up, hit myself in the right eye with my right hand fist, cause the sheet was not going any furthr. Had a black eye..... Try explaining that to your boss????? I gave myself the black eye but no one would believe me. I was a H.R. Assist. too.

title: Stupid Moments In One's Life

content: I was testifying in court during a bench trial. There was the judge, stenographer, defendant, and the 2 lawyers. The defense attorney asked to be excused briefly to use a copy machine in another room. The judge agreed to the request. I noticed his honor was wearing a yarmulke. I asked the justice if we were off the record and he responded we were. That's when I told him a very clean Jewish joke. I realized immediately it wasn't the best thing to do.

content: Here's my arm-falling-asleep story: While in the army, after class (launcher training @ Redstone), I fell asleep on my arm. I roused when I turned over and felt something thump my chest. Thinking someone was F'in with me, I grabbed my "dead" hand and threw it off me...where it hit my foot locker and busted my thumb. lol This message has been edited. Last edited by: cheapthrills, Wed 01 April 2009 04:55 PM
